userreviews.userReview: I won this darling little book on goodreads giveaway. The book is broken down into twelve star signs, using the alphabet as a literary device to describe each sign. I have been an astrology lover for years, and have an extensive book collection on it. As others have mentioned, this slim paperback doesn't have anything new to offer, but it's a great introduction for the novice. Bernie Morris' descriptions of each sign are apt and I love the cover illustration.
Quick and easy read! Nothing I didn't already know about each sign. Will use it as a reference I'm sure.
Carole Devine would just like to say that she wrote the foreword of this book, but is not the main author.

description: An easy guide to astrological traits and qualities of all 12 zodiac signs in alphabetical order; also including relevant illustrations and verses.
title: ABC of Astrology
